paper_metadata.title: Ligand conjugated antisense oligonucleotide for the treatment of transthyretin amyloidosis: preclinical and phase 1 data
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the pharmacological effects of AKCEA-TTR-LRx on TTR levels and mentions the Ile84Ser pathogenic mutation in the TTR gene.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The in vivo pharmacologic activity of inotersen and AKCEA‐TTR‐LRx was compared in transgenic mice expressing the human genomic TTR transgene containing the Ile84Ser pathogenic mutation.

functional_data.summary: The study demonstrated that both inotersen and AKCEA-TTR-LRx effectively reduced TTR levels in a transgenic mouse model.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the transgenic mouse model.
variants.additional_notes: The study primarily focuses on the pharmacological effects of the drug rather than detailed patient data.
key_quotes: The in vivo pharmacologic activity of inotersen and AKCEA‐TTR‐LRx was compared in transgenic mice expressing the human genomic TTR transgene containing the Ile84Ser pathogenic mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided specific information regarding the TTR variant.
